Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Horrible, corrupt monsters are blocking the mouth of the Paraanon Ravine. No one can get through.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:17#300442#Heavens Fall guards}, {@LinkCreature:17#300552#barrelhead threshers}, and {@LinkCreature:17#301220#mutated elins}.

Report to the nearest guild quest reward coordinator for your reward when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
